translations.english: Good morning, how are you?

translations.polish: Czy możesz mi pomóc znaleźć drogę do najbliższego sklepu?
translations.english: Can you help me find the way to the nearest store?
What will the weather be like tomorrow?
How much is a cinema ticket?

translations.polish: Czy ten autobus jedzie na lotnisko?
translations.english: Does this bus go to the airport?
I have a reservation under the name Kowalski.
Where can I buy tickets?
Is it far from here?

translations.polish: Jaka jest najlepsza droga do centrum miasta?
translations.english: What is the best way to get to the city center?
May I have a map?
When do you open in the morning?

translations.polish: Czy ta restauracja serwuje dania wegetariańskie?
translations.english: Does this restaurant offer vegetarian dishes?

translations.polish: Jak dojechać do najbliższej stacji metra?
translations.english: How to get to the nearest subway station?
Can I pay by card?
Where is the nearest pharmacy?

translations.polish: Ile czasu zajmuje dojazd do muzeum?
translations.english: How long does it take to get to the museum?
Is parking allowed here?
What is the WiFi code?

translations.polish: Czy ten pociąg zatrzymuje się w Krakowie?
translations.english: Does this train stop in Krakow?
Where can I rent a car?
